author: Dorian Geiger
title: Zelensky  warns of "new stage of terror" in latest video
description: "They are trying to physically eliminate representatives of the legitimate local Ukrainian authorities," said the Ukrainian president.
content:
Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky warned of "a new stage of terror" in a video posted to Telegram on Friday night, referencing the abduction of the mayor of Melitopol by Russian forces.
